news.title: Gauhati High Court Addresses NRC and Citizenship Issues
news.content: The Gauhati High Court has provided crucial directions on National Register of Citizens (NRC) implementation and citizenship verification processes in Assam, ensuring fair and transparent procedures.

news.title: Flood Management and Disaster Preparedness Guidelines
news.content: The court has issued comprehensive guidelines for flood management and disaster preparedness across the northeastern states, emphasizing early warning systems and community participation.

news.title: Tea Garden Workers Rights Protection
news.content: Gauhati High Court mandates improved working conditions and fair wages for tea garden workers across Assam, ensuring compliance with labor laws and social security provisions.
